name: Press Play TO PLAY The Game All-Stars: Memory Royale
name_original: Press Play TO PLAY The Game All-Stars: Memory Royale
description:
This game is a lot of things. Here are some of them:

  • A game
  • A Spinoff to the Press Play TO PLAY The Game Series
  • It's pretty much the dark souls of memory games
  • It's a game containing all your favorite characters from the first 2 Press Play TO PLAY The Game games and remixes of the best tracks from their soundtracks (aka I just reused all the assets I already had)
  • It was made for Game Breaker's Toolkit Jam 7, with the theme "Are you feeling lucky?"
  • Probably one of the best games ever ngl

My Highscore against the AI was 4 points. If you can beat my highscore tell me and maybe you can win something.
